response.explain: The previous action code successfully put the strawberry inside the fridge. Now, the next step is to close the fridge.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge.
(2) Open the fridge.
(3) Grasp the apple.
(4) Move the robot to the fridge.
(5) Put the apple inside the fridge.
(6) Move the robot to the tray.
(7) Grasp the strawberry from the tray.
(8) Move the robot to the fridge.
(9) Put the strawberry inside the fridge.
(10) Close the fridge.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 10: Close the fridge
    fridge = registry(env, "fridge_xyejdx_0")
    close(robot, fridge)
    donothing(env)
